title: Hyatt Zhuhai Retreat with Indoor & Outdoor Pools, Rooftop Bar & Spa
description:
Experience the allure of China's Greater Bay Area with a stay at this luxurious retreat. Situated in the heart of Hengqin Island in Zhuhai, the hotel offers a sophisticated escape in a vibrant destination. Discover the nearby Chimelong Ocean Kingdom, one of the world's largest marine theme parks, or indulge in retail therapy at the Hengqin Port Commercial Plaza.

The hotel's world-class facilities ensure an unforgettable stay. Dine and drink at one of the many on-site restaurants and bars, each offering a unique culinary journey with a selection of drinks, or keep active at the fitness centre. Venture beyond the hotel to explore the area's cultural heritage, or take a short ferry ride to the bustling metropolis of Macau.
offer_address: 1295 Qisecaihong Road, Guangdong, Hengqin, Zhuhai, 519031 China

title: Glamorous Seafront Luxury Overlooking Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macau Bridge
description: A stone's throw from glitzy Macau and vibrant Hong Kong, InterContinental Zhuhai, an IHG Hotel, is perfect for travellers looking for a central mainland China stay. Seaside bliss meets cosmopolitan city living at this stylish hotel which boasts four sumptuous eateries, a modern fitness centre and a dazzling outdoor infinity pool. When it's time to explore, find yourself surrounded by upscale dining, plentiful shopping and dazzling South China Sea vistas.
offer_address: No.1 Qinglv South Road, Xiang Zhou Qu, Zhuhai, 519020, China

title: China: Zhuhai Pullman Downtown Escape with Two Restaurants & Outdoor Pool
description:
Strategically positioned near the Macau border and Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macau Bridge, this luxury business hotel puts you right in the action. Five minutes from Qianshan metro station and located within a commercial complex boasting over 200 shops and international restaurants, you're well connected to explore both sides of the Pearl River Delta.

Unwind after busy days in the outdoor pool or fitness centre, and enjoy well-appointed rooms, all-day dining restaurants and a lobby lounge. Whether you're sealing deals or seeking relaxation, this contemporary retreat delivers modern comfort with that signature Pullman flair that keeps savvy travellers coming back for more.
offer_address: 2029 Jiuzhou Boulevard West, Xiangzhou, Guangdong 519000, China

title: China Zhuhai City Centre Stay Minutes from Haibin Beach
description: A refined retreat towering over the urban sprawl, Crowne Plaza Zhuhai City Center, an IHG Hotel is your gateway to this vibrant seaside city. Marvel at the Zhuhai Grand Theatre's stunning architecture, plunge into the salty surf at Haibin Beach or browse the boutiques of Zhuhai Duty-Free Shopping Mall. Satisfy your appetite with dim sum at Treasure Chinese Restaurant or end your evening sipping on a sophisticated cocktail in the Lobby Lounge.
offer_address: No.188 Jingshan Road, Jida, Zhuhai 519015, China
